attributes.action: UK Government to lobby FIFA to make Seb Blatter resign following his outrageous remarks about racism in football!
attributes.additional_details:
The UK Government to lobby FIFA to make Seb Blatter resign following his outrageous remarks about racism in football.

The Fifa president appeared to suggest on Wednesday that racial discrimination could be settled with a handshake.

rejection.details: The FIFA leadership is a matter for FIFA. However, the Prime Minister and the Sports Minister have both made statements on this issue.
